title: NBCUNIVERSAL MEDIA

meta_data.description: We are one of the world’s leading media and entertainment companies in the development, production, and marketing of entertainment, news and information to a
meta_data.abstract: We are one of the world’s leading media and entertainment companies in the development, production, and marketing of entertainment, news and information to a global audience.NBCUniversal is a subsidiary of Comcast Corporation.
